sentences: A professor of voice at Berklee College of Music, Saunders has two solo recordings on his independent label, Black Honey Records: the improvisational A Groove So Deep: The Live Sessions and 2003's Enter My Mind.
He co-produced and co-wrote Love 360, the debut jazzy soul project from April Hill released in fall of 2007.
From 2015-2017, Marlon toured with Stevie Wonder on The Songs In The Key of Life Tour as choir director.

He also performed a Christmas a cappella version of "Dreams Dreams", the theme from Nights into Dreams, with a small vocal ensemble that can be heard during the ending credits of Christmas Nights as well as on its soundtrack.
